snippet.title: Crystal Clash - Beta Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist it now!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1839660/Crystal_Clash/

Join the BETA now!
https://discord.gg/DnaEh8xmJ6

Crystal Clash is a hybrid of MOBA, tower defense and deckbuilding - with fast-paced, easy-to-pickup tug-of-war strategy, releasing Jan 14th. 

Play 2v2 or co-op with a friend, or pair up with new allies and enemies for action-packed battles! Collect cards, build your decks and have fun crushing your enemies!
